getAuthor() - Method in class ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.dataClasses.Story
Returns the author of the story as a String (or null is the story author was null).

Example:
Story myStory = ("title", "author", "desc", "123");
UUID id = myStory.getId();
System.out.println(id);

Output would be: "author"

getDescription() - Method in class ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.dataClasses.Story
Returns the description of the story as a String (or null is the story title was null).

Example:
Story myStory = ("title", "author", "desc", "123");
UUID id = myStory.getId();
System.out.println(id);

Output would be: "desc"
getFirstChapterId() - Method in class ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.dataClasses.Story
Returns the description of the story as a String (or null is the story title was null).

Example:
Story myStory = ("title", "author", "desc", "123");
UUID chapid = UUID.randomUUID();
myStory.setFirstChapterId(chapid);
System.out.println(myStory.getFirstChapterId());

Output would be something like: "5231b533-ba17-4787-98a3-f2df37de2aD7"

getPhoneId() - Method in class ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.dataClasses.Story
Returns the description of the story as a String (or null is the story title was null).

Example:
Story myStory = ("title", "author", "desc", "123");
UUID phoneId = myStory.getPhoneId();
System.out.println(phoneId);

Output would be: "123"
getPhoneId(Context) - Static method in class ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local.Utilities
This functions gets the id of the device and returns it as a string CODE REUSE: This code is modified from: URL: http://developer.samsung.com/android/technical-docs/How-to-retrieve-the-Device-Unique-ID-from-android-device Date: Nov.
